short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically summarizes webpages and allows you to ask questions about them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge Your Browsing with Gemini AI - This extension uses Google's Gemini API to automatically generate summaries of articles, blogs, and more, helping you grasp the main points quickly. Ask follow-up questions to dive deeper into the content. A must-have productivity tool for efficient web research and reading.
